metadata.title: CVE-2024-42067 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:bpf: Take return from set_memory_rox() into account withbpf_jit_binary_lock_ro()set_memory_rox() can fail, leaving memory unprotected.Check return and bail out when bpf_jit_binary_lock_ro() returnsan error.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
